meta_desc: Apartment Olive — bright duplex with private pool, terrace with garden and sea view, BBQ, fully equipped kitchen, air conditioning in all rooms, and private parking in Lovran near Opatija.
olive_intro: Sunny duplex with private pool, terrace, garden, and sea view.
desc_p1: Apartment Olive offers a bright and spacious stay with a sunny terrace overlooking the Adriatic. Ideal for 2–4 guests, it features a modern interior, plenty of natural light, and quick access to beaches and the Opatija Riviera.
desc_p2: Whether you are planning a relaxing holiday or working remotely by the sea, Olive is equipped to make your stay comfortable and memorable.
highlights: 🌅 Terrace with garden and sea view
avail_note: Select your dates to check availability.
contact_p: Interested in Apartment Olive? Send us your inquiry directly:
